description.value:
As a standard action, you can become invisible (as per the @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{Invisibility} spell). You can remain invisible for 1 minute per day per oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

Starting at 9th level, each time you activate this ability you can treat it as @Compendium[pf1.spells.cxgi0ub77t6aink1]{Invisibility, Greater}, though each round spent this way counts as 1 minute of your normal invisibility duration.

You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.
